display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Blasters Wrath F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to inflict moderate fire damage and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
